pages.text: $(major)DNA Helices/$ contain genetic information. This can be either in the form of a $(minor)Gene/$, or an $(minor)Entity/$.$(br2)Freshly crafted, a DNA Helix contains only the Entity that the DNA came from.

pages.title: Encrypted DNA Helix
pages.text: This DNA Helix contains the genetic information of a $(minor)Cow/$, but the actual Gene it has is $(bad)unknown/$. To decrypt it, you'll need to pass it through a $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/dna_decrypter)DNA Decrypter/$.

pages.title: Decrypted DNA Helix
pages.text: This DNA Helix has been decrypted, and now we can see it contains the $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/milky)Milky/$ Gene.
